body_html: your pytorch is installed in an env called pytorch (maybe you did this on purpose), but ipython is actually installed in the root env. You presumably need to first install ipython in the "pytorch" env and launch that ipython to have import torch work.
body_text: your pytorch is installed in an env called pytorch (maybe you did this on purpose), but ipython is actually installed in the root env. You presumably need to first install ipython in the "pytorch" env and launch that ipython to have import torch work.
body: your pytorch is installed in an env called pytorch (maybe you did this on purpose), but ipython is actually installed in the root env. You presumably need to first install ipython in the "pytorch" env and launch that ipython to have `import torch` work.
